participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: Playful and imaginative, enjoys storytelling and make-believe.
participant_1.background: i like to play with my dolls. i'm four. i do not pick up my toys. my best friend lives next door.

participant_2.name: Daniel
participant_2.personality: Disciplined and responsible, with a passion for reading and a unique career.
participant_2.background: i only eat kosher. i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. i'm a stunt double as my second job. i was raised in a single parent household. i read twenty books a year.

content.text: I'm not gon na let you go.
